TopicTitle: How can I set the fps limit to 24?

Articles.Content: I'm doing a cinematic that required 24 frames per second, and I have a motion blur mod installed. The blur is therefore too "short" when capturing the game running at a higher framerate. Is it possible to set the limit this low?

If you haven't tried already- you can go to stock 'settings.cfg' in your ksp directory and change "FRAMERATE_LIMIT" from the default to 24  or any number you like. I don't know how it will work with the motion blur mod though.
